features.name: Authentication System
features.description: User authentication with login, registration, and session management using Supabase Auth

features.name: Dashboard
features.description: Main dashboard displaying system overview, statistics, and quick actions

features.name: Super Admin Dashboard
features.description: Comprehensive admin panel for managing users, organizations, plans, payment requests, discount codes, system settings, and analytics

features.name: Inventory Management
features.description: Vehicle fleet management with CRUD operations, status tracking, maintenance records, and document management

features.name: Financial Management
features.description: Income and expense tracking with categorization, reports, and balance calculations

features.name: Assets Management
features.description: Management of company assets including equipment, tools, and other resources

features.name: Team Management
features.description: User and team member management with role-based permissions (Owner, Admin, Supervisor, Driver)

features.name: Trip Calculator
features.description: Calculate trip costs, fuel consumption, and profitability

features.name: Subscription System
features.description: Multi-tier subscription plans with trial periods, payment processing via InstaPay/Vodafone Cash, and subscription management

features.name: Payment Requests
features.description: Manual payment verification system where users upload receipts and admins approve/reject requests

features.name: Discount Codes
features.description: Promotional discount code system with percentage or fixed amount discounts

features.name: Landing Page
features.description: Marketing landing page showcasing features and pricing

features.name: Settings & Configuration
features.description: User profile settings, organization settings, and system preferences

features.name: Analytics & Reports
features.description: System-wide analytics including user stats, revenue tracking, subscription metrics, and growth data

features.name: Offline Sync
features.description: Local database synchronization using Dexie for offline functionality

features.name: Export Functionality
features.description: Export data to Excel/CSV format

features.name: Toast Notifications
features.description: User feedback system with toast notifications

features.name: Theme System
features.description: Dark mode theme provider

features.name: Error Handling
features.description: Global error boundary for catching and displaying errors

features.name: Welcome & Announcements
features.description: Onboarding modals and system announcements

features.name: Database Viewer
features.description: Admin tool for viewing and managing database tables

features.name: Layout & Navigation
features.description: Application layout with sidebar navigation and responsive design
